resources.string: Wonep converts international calls to local calls without WiFi or data
If the person youâ€™re calling also has Wonep the call will be entirely free
We have a very small charge for non-Wonep calls to mobiles or landlines
SEFKIM is a project that was made\nin the scope of an android class\ni had at INSA CVL.
In this application you will interactwith images offered by : \n\nFLICKR API
I used different methods offered by the API such as "search" and "getRecent"to give the user the freedome and the ability to enjoy both FLICKR images and the beauty of this app.
You can explore trends, categories or even search your favourite topics.\nDownloading your favorites or liking them to return to them back later is also an option.
